data.text: @Astartiel Well, none that we know of...
@Fae_Thee Maybe I'll check him out at the library & see what I think. Thanks.
@Astartiel The V-Wars books (and many others) are written by Jonathan Maberry, a very talented author. I highly recommend them.
@Fae_Thee No, I never have. Only watched the series (re-watching it right now). Better than the series, I'm gonna guess (they always are!).
@Astartiel V-Wars was a damned good show, shame on Netflix for cancelling it. Have you read the books?
Also the little boy, Kyle Breitkopf, playing Ian Somerhalder's son on V Wars, looks so much like Henry Thomas, when he was in E.T.
@Astartiel Well, it looked like it might be heading that way. But honestly I think it was fine he wasn’t, I mean they were not exactly Mystic Falls candidate vampires…
@zenity_st I was disappointed he wasn't a vampire in that. LOL. Also a Damon Salvatore fan.
